question: What ingredients are used in Daily Greens drinks?
answer: All our drinks are made with 100% natural and organic ingredients. We use fresh fruits, vegetables, and superfoods without any artificial preservatives, colors, or flavors. Each ingredient is carefully selected to ensure maximum nutritional value.

question: How many calories are in each drink?
answer: Our drinks range from 80-200 calories per serving, making them perfect for any diet program. Each product label includes detailed nutritional information so you can make informed choices based on your health goals.

question: Do you offer delivery services?
answer: Yes, we offer delivery services through our website and mobile app. Delivery is available within a 10km radius of our stores. Orders over IDR 150,000 get free delivery!

question: Are your drinks suitable for people with dietary restrictions?
answer: Absolutely! We offer vegan, gluten-free, and dairy-free options. Our menu clearly labels all allergens, and our staff can provide detailed ingredient information to help you choose the right drink for your dietary needs.
